news.title: Fintech firm Betterment confirms data breach after hackers send fake crypto scam notification to users
news.summary: Hackers gained access to some Betterment customers’ personal information through a social engineering attack, then targeted some of them with a crypto-related phishing message.

news.title: Developers have made $550 billion on Apple’s App Store since 2008
news.summary: Apple says its services had a "record-breaking year," as Apple TV, Apple Music, and Apple Pay also soared.

news.title: Google’s Gemini to power Apple’s AI features like Siri
news.summary: Apple and Google have embarked on a non-exclusive, multi-year partnership that will involve Apple using Gemini models and Google cloud technology for future foundational models.

news.title: Paramount files lawsuit against Warner Bros. amidst controversial Netflix merger
news.summary: Paramount has filed a lawsuit against Warner Bros. Discovery, demanding greater financial disclosure regarding Netflix's $82.7 billion acquisition.

news.title: A New Jersey lawsuit shows how hard it is to fight deepfake porn
news.summary: For more than two years, an app called ClothOff has been terrorizing young women online — and it’s been maddeningly difficult to stop. The app has been taken down from the two major app stores and it’s banned from most social platforms, but it’s still available on the web and through a Telegram bot.

news.title: Anker goes big with new whole home backup system
news.summary: Homeowners in search of grid independence have another option today with the launch of Anker's Solix E10 big-ass battery system.
